    • Method Detail

      • isOutputting

        public boolean isOutputting()
        Returns:
        whether this neuron has calculated it's output

      • getOutput

        public double getOutput()
        Returns the output of this neuron. If this is called before the calculation has completed a RuntimeException is thrown. Check prior to usage with isOutputting()
        Returns:
        the calculated output of this neuron

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Stops this neuron outputting. All neurons must be cleared before network calculation begins

      • addInput

        public void addInput(Neuron input,
                     double incomingWeight)
        Connect a neuron as an input to this neuron
        Parameters:
        input - input neuron
        incomingWeight - weight of connection from input neuron to this neuron

      • tryCalculate

        public boolean tryCalculate()
        If all inputs are outputting, calculate the output, such that it can be accessed with getOutput()
        Returns:
        whether the calculation was successful (unsuccessful if an input neuron is not outputting)
